website_summaries.verdict: This feature-packed selfie stick is a versatile option that dedicated smartphone photographers will certainly appreciate.
pros: Extends to 51 inches and retracts to 19 inches
Easily fits most phones and cases
Quickly converts from selfie stick to tripod
cons: A relatively pricey but well-made selfie stick

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! I was able to use my IPhone 8 Plus in landscape, portrait mode to capture a group photo. Setting up the Bluetooth remote was simple and fast. This tripod was a great addition to our night as we were able to all be on the pictures. I highly recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Product was in bad/used condition when it was received
customer_reviews.text: The tripod I received was either used or had been left out somewhere. Most of the connections were rusted. The part that holds the camera was rusted solid and would not slide to attach a camera. The rest of the tripod was covered in dirt and has rust on several of the screws. I am not impressed with the product that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Speagle.Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Product appears to have been in someone else's house...
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to have been in someone else's house... Didn't look like factory packing... Part that holds phone and attaches to tripod had a stripped connection... The Bluetooth did not work... I was able to use with tablet holder on the tripod... Useless as selfie stick, glad it wasn't my priority. I didn't want to surpass my return quota and get banned, maybe next time... I would not buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Raven Rider

customer_reviews.title: Search no further! STURDY and RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: I've spent quite a bit of time on Selfie stick research... When I found this one, my inner gut feeling was telling me - this is the right one and I was so right. This item is solid, obviously heavy duty and reliable, any of my phones fit well and secure. I won't go into technical description, but I guarantee, this is the real deal, as I already used it couple of times and I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Bibster

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tripod. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the FugeTek FT-569. It is a great tripod. I want to take videos of many things but being hands free at the same time. This tripod is priced right (rather low I should say) and is just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: xrun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The stand broke the first time I used it. I do not reccomend this product. Save your money and buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Good tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is a great adjustable tripod, the legs are attached, which is very convenient, many other on this site don't offer that feature. The one thing I don't like, is the way you attach your phone, you have to use a screw type thing to tighten and loosen the grip, which takes a little more time than a simple spring function.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth remote stopped working after the first day!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth remote stopped working after the first day on my vacation... for the rest of the time we had to set the timer to take a photo with it and it really put a damper on the trip. So very disappointing because everything else about it was great. Poorly made bluetooth remote.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I received a regular old tri-pod with no connection to even hold a phone. Disappointed and a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Its a nice color. 2. Does come in hand to take good selfies. 3. Very very good height adjustment. 4. The part that holds the phone is a little wobbly. Could a bit more stable to hold phones that have cases. 5. Does come with a remote. ( on mine the zoom in/out buttons do not work. Instead they take the photo. 6. The tri part(3 leg stands) need to be made so that they clip in so they dont come out when not in use. 7. Overall still gets the job done and would recommend to people who like taking their own photos.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be something more sherdy but it’s not. Please make sure to write an accurate description of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after the three days.
customer_reviews.text: This item lacks product integrity, take your business else where, so you don't have to waste your time having to send this crap back to Bangkok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! I used it in India and was able to get some awesome shots. The only downside is that the stand is lite so it waves a little with a breeze but even that was nominal. The extension length is perfect and allows for a perfect height for just about everything! I used this in India and was able to record out the window of our car by putting the phone in the bracket and extending the stick out of the window. So, definitely a great item!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t work !!! I have iOS
customer_reviews.text: This was a great selfie stick , but you need a Apple Watch if you have iOS cause the blue tooth didn’t work ! This is good for a miniature tripod but not useful for much more . I wouldn’t recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn morales

customer_reviews.title: Remote won't pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best looking selfie stick I have ever seen. I just can't use it. The remote won't pair up to my Samsung Galaxy S7. I will be forced to return it. Maybe the next one will work
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This is not really a selfie stick. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not really a selfie stick. It is a tripod but you can’t remove the tripod legs. You will have to fold the tripod legs and wrap your hand around them to even consider it a selfie stick. It’s awkward and heavy. You also don’t get free returns so I would only get this if you only want it for tripod use.
customer_reviews.author: Evan haight

customer_reviews.title: not a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: sticking a pretty cheap and useless remote on a “tripod” doesn’t make a tripod into a selfie stick, it still is a tripod! works fine as a tripod. remote control is pretty useless on ios. you have to manually open the camera app and then put it on vide or photo or whatever option and then the only thing the three buttons on the remote do is shutter control. the tripod itself works ok as a tripod for a phone. as a selfie stick, pretty much sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rokni

customer_reviews.title: Broke After A Few Uses - Disappointing and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tripod just a handful of times. The leg broke recently so now it's completely useless. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: sykobunny

customer_reviews.title: Tripod is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The good: The remote works consistently. Unfortunately the phone has no indication that the recording is happening, so you just have to trust the remote worked. But that is an issue with the phone and not the remote. The Bad: The tripod base is way too small, especially for how high it raises the camera. Once extended all the way, a very slight breeze will blow it over. Check out the video, it wasn't even a breezy day. Now my screen is massively cracked.
customer_reviews.author: James Parr

customer_reviews.title: A bolt loosens ... be careful with  your device
customer_reviews.text: The product worked the initial time in order for me to record a 30 + minute video. A week later tried to record another video the contraption that holds the phone wouldn't remain as pictured. The device (phone holder) kept shifting with ease to a 90 degree angle. Didn't feel safe with filming at that angle. Purpose of the device was lost due to the fact that I had to use someone else to shoot my film for me. Dissatisfied customer. Unfortunately passed the grace period of exchange or return.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it broke shortly after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple phone tripods. I am a single mom and it is the only way I get photos with my kids on trips or anytime really. This tripod WAS my favorite yet, until the attachment for the phone broke halfway through our vacation I purchased it specifically for. It was a major bummer because I actually loved how easy it was to use and fold up before it broke. I guess it doesn’t matter how well it works if it breaks easily. :( I am almost tempted to buy it again to give it another shot because I did like it so much when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese tripod
customer_reviews.text: This is just your run of the mill, cheap Chinese plastic tripod. It doesn't tilt, so your shots are always going to be parallel with the horizon. Prepare to get bombarded with emails for reviews and giveaways. I don't know why Amazon gives our contact information out to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Taron Ghazaryan

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: EDIT TO ADD- after a year, this is a little wobbly. It’s not as strong as when I first purchased. I am looking for a stronger, sturdier phone tripod now. This is my favorite amazon purchase to date! I use this every week for a family picture. It makes photos so easy to get everyone involved. It feels a little flimsy sometimes but it holds onto my phone perfectly. The remote is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: While it was heavy duty and seemed sturdy, it would not hold my phone on an ...
customer_reviews.text: While it was heavy duty and seemed sturdy, it would not hold my phone on an even plane. The cradle had a small flaw that caused it to be tilted to either the left or right. It was frustrating and so I had to return the product
customer_reviews.author: Keevan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not connect to BlueTooth
customer_reviews.text: The stand is fine, but so far as I can tell the remote simply does not work. I am able to charge it, but it does not "flash blue" when turned on, as the instructions say it will, and my iPhone bluetooth does not recognize it. I'm keeping the product because I need to use the stand, and I have contacted the seller. Perhaps I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this selfie stick to take hunting photos. The tripod really works well outdoors, no more propping my phone up against a tree! The cellphone attachment actually works well with any type phone,even using an iPhone 5 and iPhone 8. That's a good bit of difference in size but they both fit, even with an Otterbox case on. This stick is very lightweight so it's super easy to carry and small enough that it can be stored easily too. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: gmabunny

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a dozen uses!
customer_reviews.text: It is too light weight as a tripod with phone attached, with the slightest of wind it topples over hitting the ground. It broke in less than a dozen uses. Luckily my phone in tact thanks to my phone case. I do NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pofe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time, energy
customer_reviews.text: Returned 2 of them. This selfie stick is not compatible with an iPhone 6 s. I took it on vacation with me only to figure out it didn’t work when I arrived to my destination. I asked a question about it on here and received no helpful answers. When I returned home, I ordered a replacement just to make sure it wasn’t that it was malfunctioning. The replacement didn’t work either. Would be helpful if they could accurately inform you of which iPhone models it’s compatible with.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be angled correctly and is unstable.
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the other reviews. The hinge that holds the camera cannot be angled to any position but instead defaults to 15° increments --thereby making it impossible to get your camera ideally directed! Trying to to set the angle between the hard settings causes the hinge to pop loose and the camera to fall to the next angle. That is totally unacceptable. Additionally, the tripod base is so small that it's unstable. It has literally fallen over repeatedly from the mere weight of holding an iPhone 11 --while on a stable concrete basement floor! Find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clements

customer_reviews.title: It is a reliable and helpful item
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me this item because I'm the one in charge of pics when we're on vacation. If it is a short trip, I don't take the professional camera, most times I used my phone. In my case, my phone has an amazing resolution and is great when it comes to take pics. Having this product as an extra tool, it makes the process of taking memorable pics so easy. To me works fantastic, great height, very helpful, the Bluetooth sync right away with my Android, also it's easy to carry around in the bag provided. I can say I recommend this products!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Deoca

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a couple weeks! Not sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tripod to replace my smaller one because I wanted something taller. This one is definitely taller however it is very flimsy. See my video... It is not very sturdy. Also the gripping mechanism broke after about two weeks so it is not usable. I was not able to return it in time because I wasn’t sure why it wasn’t hold phone any longer until I inspect it closely and saw that the outer side gripping device had broken. Once again see the video for a closer look. I would not purchase this particular model again!
customer_reviews.author: Ishwann Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Do NOT buy. Worked 1 time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product 3 months ago. When I 1st used it I was very happy with how easy ot was to charge/sync the remote, set up the tripod and use. The 2nd time I went to use it the remote would not sync to my bluetooth 😡 The product is basically useless without the remote functioning. Despite the company saying ot has a 1yr warranty. The return window through Amazon has closed. Used 1 time - broken. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent Phone Tripod
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any of the remote features of this tripod, so I don't know how they work. This tripod works pretty well for what it is. It's not going to compare to a professional photography tripod, but it works for my purposes. It is easy to extend to get to just the right height, the base is steady, the only issue with it is that it's a bit wobbly when extended to half-length or more. Not a huge deal since you're probably not going to be touching it, just don't bump it while filming.
customer_reviews.author: HCarleton

customer_reviews.title: Stable phone platform!!
customer_reviews.text: So...here's an anomaly...I despise selfie sticks in general, however, I definitely bought this one...but not for selfies, but instead for family portraits (say while hiking) and for videoing golf lessons for my son and I. The Bluetooth remote worked nearly straight out of the box, and the built-in holder just adds to its usefulness. I have an iPhone 11 with a thick case on it, and this tripod fits my phone with zero issues. I would definitely recommend this to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I feel my phone is safer with this tripod
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a couple of days, but so far this is the best tripod for the money! I needed to buy this for work. I use a tripod to make videos constantly. I previously bought 2 other tripod/selfie sticks that did NOT work for me at all! I saw others complain about having to screw your phone on, instead of a pull system. I will say that is the reason I bought this one. It keeps my phone much more securely into the mount. My old tripod I couldn't use anymore because my phone would just spring loose. Which could end up breaking your phone or cracking the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems nice but it’s not. Poorly built but easy to connect and use.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, Prior One month would have given 5stars for this selfie stick/tripod. Everything seemed sturdy and good quality. Easy to use. But suddenly yesterday, the holder where the phone is attached, the upper part just broke and my new phone fell off while taking the pictures. So it seems study from outside but is still poorly built. Stars go down from 5 to 1. Cannot return the product as return window is closed. Not happy spending on this product.
customer_reviews.author: charmi savjani

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy. Phone bracket broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tripod for casual Facebook videos and from the photos and reviews, I thought this would do the trick. I was surprised to unpack it and find it rather lightweight and much flimsier than I would have expected from the photos and description. The description of this as "heavy-duty aluminum" is misleading in my opinion. The legs are wobbly and one is already loose. The phone mount cracked at the joint where you tighten the phone into the mount after about 3 uses. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rephann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tripod/selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It is well built, feels durable, extremely light and portable. It’s smartly designed my only comment would be that I wish we could have taken the stick out of the tripod base somehow. With the base attached it feels a bit heavy to be used as a selfie stick. Excellent product though and the Bluetooth remote works very well too. No missed shots.
customer_reviews.author: Manta

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money if you will actually use it more than 2 times
customer_reviews.text: After 10 uses, the top plastic part that holds the phone in started to bend back so that the phone now is loose. We were walking filming and the phone fell out of the holder. I tried calling the company and they are playing the we don't know how to forward the phones during COVID so they are not answering. I tried contacting them via support@fugetec.com and their corporate address inquiries@lonestargrp.com and no response. From reading the other reviews I thought it was amazing and it was good, but if you plan on using it more than a couple of times, find one with a metal holder at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M-E

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Felt down because of the wind. Pay attention it’s too light.
customer_reviews.author: hebbezni

customer_reviews.title: If you love a selfie stick
customer_reviews.text: If you love a selfie stick, or taking photos this is awesome. I upgraded my previous selfie stick for this one because of the tripod. The tripod at the bottom does make the stick heavier and a littler hard to hold as a selfie, but the option of having a tripod along with the stick cant be beat. You have to unscrew the top to adjust the camera holder, versus a spring on the older Fugetek model, but this minor nuance is forgiven. Would definitely purchase again and it has been great for capturing photos and videos! Now, if only you can add a stabilizer it to it...
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE you cannot use this product vertically
customer_reviews.text: i’m very disappointed. i’m a professional cosplayer so i NEED a tripod capable of moving vertically and horizontally this can only move horizontally. I think the price is a bit steep for it to only be able to put your phone in one direction.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod-selfie stick may be a stretch
customer_reviews.text: Love this product as a tripod. It’s much more sturdy than the previous one I had. I also love that it has a place to attach the remote. My previous one didn’t have this feature. It also helps that the phone holder screws open and closed to better accommodate my Otterbox case. I would purch this product again and recommend it. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool tripod for my Motorola Android phone
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've had a variety of tripods for my video and digital cameras, but decided I needed to get a tripod for my Motorola Android phone. I was delighted with the packaging, including a nice cloth carrying case. It is sturdy and has clip extensions for various stationary heights. Additionally, which I hadn't even thought of, it can also be used as a "stick" to use for selfie-like videos and photos. The Motorola Moto G7 Power is a heavy cell phone and this tripod can handle the weight. It also has knob adjustments for tilting and rotating. I recommend this highly. It is well priced too!
customer_reviews.author: Videobarbs

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: The tripod is well made, the BT remote worked great and was easy to install. But i noticed from the first time I used it it is unstable, i just thought I’d be careful when using it. Well now I wished I would have returned it, and it too late, but it’s a shame I’ve had it less that 3 months. I’ll post a video explaining why, basically the weight of you phone over hangs the part of the tripod that has the least support. And boom! Your new iPhone is on the floor. Last time it fell, it cracked the phone attachment so now it won’t hold my phone.
customer_reviews.author: DreaG

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really decent product. Not going to lie, it doesnt seem sturdy enough to be too far from it - in the event it gets tipped over. However, I havent it tried it outside yet, just my suspicion based on indoor use. My phone is heavier, it's a samsung note 8 - which the grip fits fine (yes I did take off my case)! Easy to unbox and minimal assembly required. Easy enough to use, just extending the main pole(s) and angling your phone in the grip/holder. I think for the money, buy it! If you're looking for something sturdy to use for real photography, this isnt for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: With some adaptions, I’m now pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Does the job... But rather flimsy. Have added elastic bands to help keep the phone from falling off, added limits on the extending arms, added a tether to the remote to keep it from popping off, and using rubber bands to hold the legs together. And with these additions, I’m now satisfied with its longer reach, wider tripod base, and it’s Bluetooth connection remote
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn’t work at all, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is much more flimsy than I would have thought. It wobbles a lot and the metal is very poor quality. It does hold the phone as it’s supposed to. However, the remote has not worked since I got it. It connects to Bluetooth just fine and it’s fully charged so that is not an issue. It just doesn’t work. Since that was the main reason for purchasing, the item is basically useless. Go for a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is extremely flimsy and shakes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely light weight, which is excellent if you want to carry it around with you. Unfortunately, it's not so good if you want to use it as its intended use for me, a tripod. When fully extended, with a cellphone attached on top, it will sway back and forth and continue to vibrate for minutes at a time. For obvious reasons, this is pretty impractical when using it to film a podcast or something stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Reichbach

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little thing
customer_reviews.text: I thought cell phone tripods were crap. I've had several that have broken, refused to stand up straight, been so light that every bump of the table or wind gust would make them shake. Then I bought this baby and I will never need another one! It's sturdy, extends so you can stand or sit while you film, even comes with a remote to take pics instead of having to set your timer! I like that the part that holds the camera screws open and closed instead of using a spring to stretch open. It feels much more secure. Very well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bohemia

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take selfies with my phone and have it be sturdy enough to stand on it's own. I wish it was about 8" taller because if you are standing then it doesn't work well if you are close. As for using it as a selfie stick it's a bit bulky for that. the blue tooth works great for pics and videos, just make sure your phone isn't positioned with the volume button isn't hitting the holder area. LOL The bluetooth wasn't working and I couldn't figure out what was wrong and it was that *laugh and roll my eyes at myself*
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not designed very well
customer_reviews.text: The part that extends is sturdy and doesn't wobble but that's the only good thing about this. It's hardly a selfie stick. The legs are huge around when closed and difficult to hold. The phone holder attachment doesn't rotate to change between horizontal and vertical. The tripod legs are very loose which makes it difficult to open them, makes the tripod not stable, and makes it even more difficult to hold as a selfie stick. And the base is too narrow. Even without a phone or camera it easily tips over when extended fully.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Really LOVE the concept of this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my phone as a selfie stick and tripod stand. Very versatile and well made. I was also able to use this as a primary tripod stand for my Sony a6400 at an event recently and it held up well. Only wish the height was a bit higher as a tripod stand. Other than that, great product. Love the rechargeable remote too. No need to swap batteries. And the tripod comes with a holder to easily snap on the remote control so you don't lose it. This is a highly recommended product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mashud

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is awesome! I purchased it to take pictures for my Instagram and it's perfect! The pod is easy to set up. Came in a nice package and has a nice carry bag for it. It was really easy to connect the Bluetooth remote to my phone. Only took a few moments. The remote is small and can be concealed will take pictures. It's so easy to use. I use it often for my pictures! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Will

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This device is my personal photographer. It's super simple to use it and it's a life saver when taking selfies. It has great distance/range for the remote. I travel a lot and always take great pictures as if I had someone with me all the time taking the photos for me. I use the long stick to record videos/vlongs and it's great. I am super happy with and glad I bought this device.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This tripod is amazing I love the height adjustability it seems stable and sturdy yet very lightweight the legs spread out and also narrow up very well for positioning I'm going to get a lot of use out of this I'm using it as the photo booth stand at my puppies party it's going to be great.. I would say it's not for professionals or anything and you may not want to use it in a place where you'll be touching it a lot or a place where it's very windy but if it's just going to stand there and do its job it does it very well great for youtubing amateur photo shooting
customer_reviews.author: Ms_gel_galore

customer_reviews.title: Tripod is GREAT! But you might want to consider a separate bluetooth remote.
customer_reviews.text: The tripod itself is awesome! Very sturdy, versatile, and easy to use! The buttons on the bluetooth remote don't match their functions which was disappointing (the '+' and '-' each will take a single picture, and the center button with the camera picture on it INSTANTLY starts SUPER fast burst shots and it WILL NOT stop until I can finally just exit out of my camera app.... by then there's at least 100+ pics taken (most of which are of my frantic frustrated face trying to get it to stop 🤦‍♀️) The tripod itself is worth the purchase but you may want to consider getting a separate remote.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Tripod is nicely balanced. Holds my phone well. Remote controller works well. My DSLR camera can also be mounted on this tripod. Although I would be careful using it for my DSLR, as it can loose its balance because of the camera's weight. Not very comfortable to be used as a selfie stick, because I have to hold the stick along with the tripod's feet, but it serves its purpose. Can be used both as a selfie stick and a tripod. Good for a casual beginners use. Solid metal construction.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: You need this for going LIVE or recording videos
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these at work and they are perfect for going LIVE on whichever platform. You can set the phone vertically or horizontally. They are lightweight and easy to transport. Oftentimes we are offsite and have to move quickly so lightweight stands are important. The downside though is that if you’re outside and it’s windy, the stands will sway or fall. I’m looking into getting sandbags so that I don’t have to hold them in place. The other benefit is being able to use it as a selfie stick. I love the multi-use capability. I have already told my marketing friends about this.
customer_reviews.author: suzyturn

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I love this tripod/selfie stick. It’s so light...though it was blown over by a breeze and the mount broke. So I ordered a new one not by Fugetek because they apparently don’t even have this replacement part.. I find that ridiculous! The new mount I have is better but doesn’t adjust so it can be at an angle like the one that came with the product. I’m super bummed. One other thing that did bother me a lot and was inconvenient is that you have to turn off Bluetooth to get your keyboard to pop up. It’s not a big deal. One star off for not having replacement parts available. Otherwise it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve been unhappy with an item I purchased on Amazon. The Bluetooth remote did not pare to my iPhone 7 consistently. I could not get it to pare to an iPhone 11 at all. I had it connected at one point, before I left for a vacation at the Grand Canyon, but was unsuccessful in the connection process when I reached my vacation destination. Very disappointing. The tripod and selfie stick worked well with the timer function on my phone but the whole point of purchasing this particular product was the Bluetooth remote.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Damico

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible

The selfie stick I have now-which works- did give Bluetooth instructions and advised it could not be paired with other devices. The instructions that came with this one was not at all helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I broke my expensive tripod and needed one stat. I use a tripod to record public meetings. I love that this is super lightweight and compact. It has a very small footprint for its height which is something I must have. It has a nice height for such a small monopod. And the remote control is a nice feature. Works well. For the price point you can’t go wrong. It’s not a heavy duty item but for using a cell phone for basic family photos or records for YouTube this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great selfie sick and tripod!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for a very flexible selfie stick. It's fairly long which improves the vantage point a selfie stick provides. Then there is the conversion to a tripod which really makes this product so useful. We use is for blogging on social when we are on our own. The tripod is fairly tall and the remote works well so we can take "selfies" in tripod mode which make out pictures look like they were staged and used a photographer when in actuality it was all accomplished on our own. It's a no brainer purchase, just get one!
customer_reviews.author: Icey

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: This tri-pod is superb. Well made, sturdy, and firm. The 3 point leg stand lets' it stand firm and steady on the floor or on any surface you which, A+, the locking 3 section extension easy to unlock or lock into place to get the exact extension you want, A+, the 50 inch height extension A+, the phone or camera holder lets you position the phone or camera in any angle you want, A+, the blue tooth remote to take picture or start a video, A++. Very impressed and please with this tri-pod, more than what expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Resto

customer_reviews.title: It's okay at best.
customer_reviews.text: Tripod review: PROS - Its sturdy and holds the iPhone pretty good. Easy to adjust the pole height and camera angles. It also comes with a small handy bag. CONS - The remote bluetooth is made cheap. It intermittently loses signal after pairing it to your phone (connection is not consistent). I wish that you can rotate the pole independently from the tripod stand. You'll have to lift the entire tripod to rotate the iPhone to adjust the camera's view which is cumbersome. The tri-stand some times hits objects specially when you position the tripod on tight areas. Overall opinion - I'll give it a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good for the value! The tripod can be used for phones with steady legs, but I don't think having a heavy DSLR camera on it is a good idea. You can also use it as a selfie stick. However, when the legs are folded back, the bottom of it can be too big and cumbersome to hold. The Bluetooth remote is a plus! it works well with my phone with no problem. I used this to this product to record my research presentation without any hiccups! Highly recommend it if you want a tripod/selfie stick.
customer_reviews.author: Max T

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: This has been missing in my life! Wow, just so simple to use and works anywhere. I had it out by the pool on the step stones, taking pics of my son and myself one afternoon. The bluetooth connects easily and the remote worked great. It stores very easily, hardly takes up room. I keep the remote in a kitchen drawer because i'm so afraid to lose it, but this was a great buy. You can use as a selfie stick to when you're out. I won't because i think that's weird, lol, but knock your self out. For the price and quality, this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ava M.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable tripod
customer_reviews.text: While not the most stable, this is a great little portable tripod and is fine once you set it up, just make sure it is on a relatively flat surface. The bluetooth remote is a nice extra and the fact that it has an on/off switch and also stores securely within the lower part of the tripod is great. I appreciate that the part that holds your phone is NOT spring loaded but rather adjusted via a finger screw so it will not crush your phone (unless you over tighten it...). Overall this is a great tripod and could be used as a selfie stick in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I emailed, 2x and received no reply regarding the remote, despite promises that I would be contacted relatively shortly. So, that's a problem. I can live without the remote, it's not why I purchased the set-up. But, it would've been nice to pause video in order to save post-editing time. I'd say upwards of half or more is crap that ends up being deleted. Anyway, otherwise it's fine and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all...
customer_reviews.text: I did like this phone tripod. Everything worked as it should, even the remote, which is why I bought it. It is a touch flimsy but about what I expected for the price. I'd be a little careful in higher winds. It can blow your phone over. The only real complaint is I wish the carrying bag was 3" longer so you could just fold it up and slide it in without the top section sticking out of th he bag. Overall it's a pretty good product, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the tripod, hate the remote.
customer_reviews.text: The tripod works great but has a few minor flaws. 1st the remote, it worked great the first time I recorded my son in his football game. The 2nd game the battery lasted half of that time and was on a full charge. Now to the tripod, It does tilt downwards but from the grandstands it would only tilt too much or not enough. I needed 1 notch in the middle. Hopefully the next model they upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Matthews

customer_reviews.title: I’d like something a little sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connect was a little rough and clamp for phone broke within a few uses. Could be a few changes made (sturdier) and it would be great. I epoxied mine back together and it is working now for the record.
customer_reviews.author: Customer000

customer_reviews.title: The feet are sturdy. The extensions have clamps to lock them in ...
customer_reviews.text: Made of alumni mostly. The feet are sturdy. The extensions have clamps to lock them in places instead of having to twist them to lock the extensions. The cellphone holder is detachable from a 1/4 inch screw, so I can mount a point and shoot camera to it and take selfies by either setting camera timer or using camera manufacturers apps on IOS or Android mobile devices. One piece of advice is to purchase a sand bag or ankle weight to place on the tripod to keep the selfie stick tripod from tilting over because of wind.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Remote quality

Especially I was amazed how good the remote control quality was because it was able to withstand and didn’t malfunction due to the moisture and water at cave of the winds at niagara falls I wa sable to take pictures right under the water fall. I didn’t even realize this was not water proof and yet its working. Thats some good quality remote. I’ll be using it for few more months and give a final update. For now I am totally satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.author: Shri

customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

Besides that it was great as we did not have to bother others to take our family pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Easy To Use, Convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and simple

The bluetooth controller has three buttons that all do the same thing - take a picture, but only if you have the camera open to begin with. It will also turn the video an and off if you have the camera open and set to video. Not too impressive. It works from about 20 feet away, so that's a plus. Unfortunately, you cannot use with an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great for couples

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy when used as a tripod ...

The collapsed length is a bit longer than I expected, however a carry pouch is provided - which should work. I had some issues with the first shipment - the Bluetooth remote did not work and the phone clamp was missing from the box. Their customer support was extremely responsive - quickly shipping me with replacements. I am now all set.
